website_summaries.verdict: Great price point considering you receive 6 nut crackers. Traditional design that's easy to use.
pros: Traditional design with wide-swinging jaws that will support many sizes of nuts
Set of 6 yields low price per piece
Works great for nuts with thinner shells
cons: Some questions over longevity and quality
Requires a lot of hand strength to use

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and work great. Bought them for my family holiday party crab boil. Sturdy and worked great. Have to admit most of my family used their teeth(ugh). But for those of us who used them they worked great. Plus they weren’t that expensive. Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Neeta

customer_reviews.title: it came in a nice package, easily washable but It also break easily
customer_reviews.text: Works okay, we were looking for an inexpensive item and we got it. We purchased a total of 7 orders totaling 42 items, it came in a nice package, easily washable but It also break easily, we have already thrown away 10 pieces since we purchased it because the bolts where loose and it fell apart. No major complaint other than you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Ababon

customer_reviews.title: Fairly sturdy, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: They're lobster crackers. They crack lobster. Fairly sturdy, easy to clean, and best of all they didn't break on the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Frank H. Cole IV

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: These were better than expected. The price was very reasonable and they worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a seafood dinner for 18 guests. These were great for king crab. Very sturdy and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S. Marko

customer_reviews.title: Nut crackers and Lobsters Openers
customer_reviews.text: These Openers were perfect. They were individually wrapped and very sturdy and can be used as nut crackers or for Lobsters and the price I thought was great
customer_reviews.author: CBB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great for dungeness crab.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time for my crab party, worked great for everyone. These are sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: Coastside

customer_reviews.title: Great lobster crackers.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and work well. Not the fanciest but the best for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisandave

customer_reviews.title: Crab crackers, simple design, works.
customer_reviews.text: These crab crackers work great, the design is simple, elegant. What else do you want from a crab cracker?
customer_reviews.author: Witty1

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible... Broke on first use with blue crabs. Hope they do the right thing and refund!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price - use these regularly with Dungeness crab
customer_reviews.author: Veronica R Blake

customer_reviews.title: These items were well-made at a far reduced price than ...
customer_reviews.text: These items were well-made at a far reduced price than if I had purchased them from a department store. The crab boil consisted of 16 people and the nut cracker openers were a big hit. Thank you Amazon. You get 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Miller

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They seem to work well but could be a bit heavier
customer_reviews.author: Susan Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality. Giving 3 stars because the item says you will get 6 but I only received 5
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For women who always have their man crack open the crab this does wonders don't need them anymore
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They worked really well and cracked our lobster open fine, Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Dora Beal

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!! There is only one cracker ...
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE!!! There is only one cracker in this item. Not six. Very deceptive. Despite there being a 6 in parenthesis, and the item picture shows six, there is only one 6" cracker.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson

customer_reviews.title: If you hand wash and use on smaller lobsters they're perfect. I give them away when I give lobsters ...
customer_reviews.text: fair quality, but in bulk! I'm a lobsterman and cook dozens of lobsters a week, these struggle with claws of lobsters >2lbs, but most of these nutcracker style do. Finish won't hold up in the dishwasher, but few of these chromed styles do! If you hand wash and use on smaller lobsters they're perfect. I give them away when I give lobsters to somebody, about to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Tim S

customer_reviews.title: I had ordered these plus 2 others from a different ...
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered these plus 2 others from a different MFG. These ones were stick in the joint / hard to open and close. Compared to the other ones, these were inferior in quality.
customer_reviews.author: jims.tracy

customer_reviews.title: What I've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this product yet but seems to be what I'm used to using in a restaurant. I look forward to a long life of use for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen O.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Order these because I served crab legs for Christmas Eve. My family was glad I had ordered these. They worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but nothing like the old-fashioned ones that are probably considered antiques now.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These seem pretty sturdy, we've gone through a lot of crab leg clusters with them so far
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Quality appears to be good. I like this style better then the straight ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality appears to be good. I like this style better then the straight stick type. The amount of leverage generated in the small part should be tremendous. Overall I'd recommend these to a person looking to have a nice lobster dinner or crack nuts.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Super Dad

customer_reviews.title: It's a nutcracker it work good I'm pleased I would get it again
customer_reviews.text: It's a nutcracker it work good I'm pleased I would get it again
customer_reviews.author: Frank Pimpinella

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: wanted to wait to review until after we had actually used them. the price was great so i was thinking they would break the first time they actually cracked a claw, but they were fine and did what they needed to do.
customer_reviews.author: kmh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a crab boil, just what was needed to crack them claws.
customer_reviews.author: peg

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough to last awhile through heavy use
customer_reviews.text: The quality is decent for the price. Sturdy enough to last awhile through heavy use. Not particularly elegant.
customer_reviews.author: True Stories Only

customer_reviews.title: Great price / quality Crab Crackers
customer_reviews.text: Was going to buy some cheap nutcrackers at the store but these were better priced and much nicer! We use them for cracking crab - a must in the Pacific Northwest!
customer_reviews.author: F Hyll

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Look nice, but rather weak - do not crack as well as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: KKat 10

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the quantity
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the quantity, especially as one of these nearly would cost about half as much as all of these together. All stocked for the next crab feed!
customer_reviews.author: ehawotte

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, solid feel. We've used them 2 or 3 times already and they show no signs of tarnish or discoloration. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Mom to Two

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just received them, haven't used them yet,look just like the ones at Joe's crab shack
customer_reviews.author: Needa Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Crackers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these crackers for a steamed lobster dinner. They have a nice finish. Not sure if it is polished aluminum or true chrome-plated. Hand washed before use to be safe. They do have a nice heft and are sturdy. Look great on the dining table setting. My family used them to crack large Maine lobsters. The crackers held up while cracking through the heavy claw shells. I chose to hand wash them as was not sure if they are dishwasher safe. My only complaint is they don't come with washing/care instructions nor material labeling. Hand washing kept mine in pristine condition. I will determine over time how well these crackers hold up. They can be used to crack nut shells.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: we had lobster night, they were cheap, but highly effective
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift to my son he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: londa ricketts

customer_reviews.title: As promised
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as promised, arrived on time and perfect for our lobster fest
customer_reviews.author: MKL

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend
customer_reviews.text: quality seems good. service for delivery was spot on and price was ok.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R. Gasper

product_meta.title: 6 inch nut cracker and lobster opener, chrome plated zinc alloy, pack of 6
product_meta.description: Material Type:Zink AlloyThe lobster cracker is very durable and easy to use;Great for Lobster, Seafood, Shell Fish, Oyster, Crab Shells, and All of your Favorite Nuts!!!;This Chrome Plated Zinc Alloy Utensil is Very Durable, Openes Even the Though Ones;Double Jaw Device, to Fit all Sizes! - Dishwasher Safe;Easy Grip, Durable and Withstands Wear and Tear!
feature_bullets: 6 inch nut cracker and lobster opener, chrome plated zinc alloy, pack of 6
